languages.text: {n}Сквозь грохот в ушах вы слышите надменный смех гиганта.{/n} "В твоих руках лишь часть целого... что ж, храни ее до того часа, пока мы не встретимся. Я вырву сокровище из твоих мертвых рук и употреблю ее во славу Истине".

{n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь грохот в ушах вы слышите надменный смех гиганта.{/n} "В твоих руках лишь часть целого... что ж, храни ее до того часа, пока мы не встретимся. Я вырву сокровище из твоих мертвых рук и употреблю ее во славу Истине".

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will collect this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

{n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will collect this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

{n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

{n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

{n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

languages.text: {n}在雷鸣与狂风之中，你听到了巨人轻蔑的大笑声。{/n}“你带着完整之物的一部分……既然如此，就留着它吧。等到我们见面的时候，我要从你的尸体中夺走这件圣物，将它的荣光献给真理。”
languages.original_text: {n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}在雷鸣与狂风之中，你听到了巨人轻蔑的大笑声。{/n}“你带着完整之物的一部分……既然如此，就留着它吧。等到我们见面的时候，我要从你的尸体中夺走这件圣物，将它的荣光献给真理。”

languages.text: {n}Malgré l'orage et les fortes bourrasques, vous entendez le rire méprisant du géant.{/n} « Vous ne portez qu'une fraction d'un tout... Mais conservez-la donc jusqu'à notre prochaine rencontre. Je prendrai grand plaisir à arracher cette bénédiction à votre cadavre pour la mettre au service de la Vérité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré l'orage et les fortes bourrasques, vous entendez le rire méprisant du géant.{/n} « Vous ne portez qu'une fraction d'un tout... Mais conservez-la donc jusqu'à notre prochaine rencontre. Je prendrai grand plaisir à arracher cette bénédiction à votre cadavre pour la mettre au service de la Vérité. »

languages.text: {n}A través de los truenos y el viento oyes la risa desdeñosa del coloso:{/n} «Llevas solo una parte del todo... Puedes quedártela hasta que nos encontremos. Arrancaré el preciado don de tus manos muertas y lo usaré para glorificar la Verdad».
languages.original_text: {n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}A través de los truenos y el viento oyes la risa desdeñosa del coloso:{/n} «Llevas solo una parte del todo... Puedes quedártela hasta que nos encontremos. Arrancaré el preciado don de tus manos muertas y lo usaré para glorificar la Verdad».

languages.text: {n}雷と風の中、大男の軽蔑するような笑い声が聞こえる。{/n}「お前は全なるもののわずか一欠片を持っているに過ぎない…ならば、持ち続けるがいい、次に我らが出会う時まで。この恩寵を息絶えたお前の手より抜き取り、真実の栄光のために使おう」
languages.original_text: {n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷と風の中、大男の軽蔑するような笑い声が聞こえる。{/n}「お前は全なるもののわずか一欠片を持っているに過ぎない…ならば、持ち続けるがいい、次に我らが出会う時まで。この恩寵を息絶えたお前の手より抜き取り、真実の栄光のために使おう」

languages.text: {n}Durch den Donner und den Wind hörst du das verächtliche Lachen des Riesen:{/n} "Ihr besitzt lediglich einen Teil des Ganzen ... Behaltet ihn, bis zur Stunde unserer Begegnung. Ich werde dieses Geschenk Euren toten Händen entreißen und für den Ruhm der Wahrheit einsetzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch den Donner und den Wind hörst du das verächtliche Lachen des Riesen:{/n} "Ihr besitzt lediglich einen Teil des Ganzen ... Behaltet ihn, bis zur Stunde unserer Begegnung. Ich werde dieses Geschenk Euren toten Händen entreißen und für den Ruhm der Wahrheit einsetzen."

languages.text: {n}Kopan fırtınanın ardında devin feci kahkahasını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Bir bütünün tek bir parçasına sahipmişsin... Buluşma anımıza dek sende kalsın. Bu lütfu cansız ellerinden alıp Hakikat uğruna kullanacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the thunder and wind, you hear the giant's disdainful laughter:{/n} "You carry merely one part of the whole... Keep it, then, until the hour of our meeting. I will pluck this boon from your dead hands and use it for the glory of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kopan fırtınanın ardında devin feci kahkahasını duyuyorsun:{/n} “Bir bütünün yalnızca tek bir parçasına sahipsin... Buluşma anımıza dek sende kalsın. Bu lütfu cansız ellerinden alıp Hakikat uğruna kullanacağım.”
